column1: Direct PLUS Loans to parents by Income percent of poverty level.
The names of the variables used in this table are: PLUSAMT and PCTPOV. The variable names are unique identifiers. To locate these variables, enter the variable name in the search box.
The weight variable used to calculate the data is WTA000
NOTE: Detail may not sum to totals because of rounding.
Source: U.S. Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics, National Postsecondary Student Aid Study-Administrative Collection: 2018, Undergraduates (NPSAS-AC).
